description:
Learn to work in synergy with your customers on problem solving.
Through several types of techniques, group activities, learn how to make a challenge of a problem emerge, and a solution. Then you will discover methods and techniques to help creative minds to innovate, and that will allow a group to stimulate his imagination.

Who is this course?
To all the men and women who need practical tools to implement in their daily work to co-create with their colleague / their client, and sell their ideas more effectively.


                                            Syllabus
                        
The rules of creativity
The stages of the creative process
Formulation and reformulation of the problem
Stimulate the imagination
Organize and sell ideas
Creative synergy
title: Le pragmatique : co-créer des solutions avec son collègue ou client
